column2: "Na Israelfo fii Egypt asaase do firii no n’ekyir afe a otsia ebien no mu bosoom a otsia ebien no ne da a odzi kan no
column3: EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Sinai sar do wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu dɛ
column5: "Ɔwo na Aaron mbu Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara ano
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
column7: na mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column8: na dɛ mbrɛ hɔn banyin biara ne dzin tse nkorkor."

column2: "Israel mu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa nyinara no hom nkan hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse."
"Na ebusuakuw biara mu banyin bi nka hom ho; kor biara a ɔyɛ n’egyanom fi mu otsitsir."
"Na mbanyin a womfo a ebusuakuw no mu mboa hom no hɔn edzin nye yi: Reuben dze; Sedeur ne babanyin Elizur."
"Simeon dze; Zurisadai ne babanyin Selumiel."
"Juda dze; Amminadab ne babanyin Nahson."
"Isakar dze; Zuar ne babanyin Netanel."
"Zebulun dze; Helon ne babanyin Eliab."
"Josef ne mba no dze; Efraim dze; Ammihud ne babanyin Elisama: Manaasɛ dze; Pedazur ne babanyin Gamaliel."
"Benjamin dze; Gideoni ne babanyin Abidan."
"Dan dze; Ammisaddai ne babanyin Ahiezer."
"Aser dze; Okran ne babanyin Pagiel."
"Gad dze; Deutel ne babanyin Eliasaf."
"Naftali dze; Enan ne babanyin Ahira."
"Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn wɔ mboanofo no mu
column3: hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw mu mbapɔmba no; wɔyɛ Israel mpem mpem mu etsitsir."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron faa mbanyin a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin yi:"
"na wohyiaa mboanofo no nyinara boaa ano wɔ bosoom a otsia ebien no ne da a odzi kan no mu
column3: na wɔkyerɛɛ hɔn asefo dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column4: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse
column5: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no
column3: dɛmara na ɔkaan hɔn wɔ Sinai sar no do."

column2: "Na Israel n’abakan Reuben
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column6: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no
column7: ɔbanyin biara a oedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir
column8: na hɔn a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Reuben ebusuakuw mu
column3: nyinara yɛ mpemeduanan esia na ahaenum."

column2: "Simeon ne mba
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no
column6: ɔbanyin biara a oedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir
column7: na hɔn a wotum kɔ ɔsa nyinara;"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Simeon ebusuakuw mu no
"Gad ne mba
column6: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse
column7: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Gad ebusuakuw mu
column3: nyinara yɛ mpemeduanan enum ahaesia na eduonum."

column2: "Juda ne mba
column6: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse
column7: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir na hɔn a wotum kɔ ɔsa nyinara"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Juda ebusuakuw mu no nyinara mpemeduosuon anan na ahaesia."
"Isakar ne mba
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir
column6: hɔn a wotum kɔ ɔsa nyinara"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Isakar ebusuakuw mu no yɛ mpemeduonum anan na ahaanan."
"Zebulun ne mba
column6: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no
column7: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Zebulun ebusuakuw mu nyinara
"Josef n’asefo a wɔyɛ
column7: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Efraim ebusuakuw mu no yɛ mpemeduanan na ahaenum."
"Manaasɛ ne mba
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no
column6: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Manaasɛ ebusuakuw mu nyinara
"Benjamin ne mba
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse
column6: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa nyinara;"

column2: "hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Benjamin ebusuakuw mu no
"Dan ne mba
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no
column6: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn
column3: wɔ Dan ebusuakuw mu no nyinara yɛ mpemeduosia ebien na ahaesuon."

column2: "Aser ne mba
column6: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse no hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa"

column2: "wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Aser ebusuakuw mu no nyinara
"Naftali ne mba
column6: dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse
column7: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa nyinara"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Naftali ebusuakuw mu no nyinara
"Iyinom nye hɔn a Moses na Aaron nye Israel mbapɔmba no a wɔyɛ mbanyin duebien no kanee no: wogyinagyinaa hɔn egyanom efi ananmu nkorkor."
"Dɛm ntsi hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Israelmba mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee nyinara
column3: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir a wotum kɔ ɔsa wɔ Israel mu"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn nyinara no yɛ mpemahaesia na ebiasa na ahaenum eduonum."
"Levifo no dze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw tse no

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: nkyii so mma mmbu hɔn dodow ano mmfora Israelmba:"

column2: "mbom woara fa Levifo no si dase ntamadan no na no ho ndzɛmba nyinara na dza odzi wɔ no nyinara do: hɔn na wɔnsoa ntamadan no
column3: na no ho ndzɛmba nyinara; na wɔnyɛ ho edwuma
column4: na wɔmbɔ nseraban nhyia ntamadan no ho."

column2: "Na sɛ worutu ntamadan no akɔ kan a
column3: Levifo no na wontutu: na sɛ wɔrekyer ntamadan no nsera a
column4: Levifo no na wonsi: na sɛ ɔhɔho ba ho a wonku no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no mbɔ hɔn asesee
column3: nyimpa biara wɔ nankasa ne nseraban do
column4: na nyimpa biara wɔ nankasa ne frankaa ho
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse."

column2: "Levifo no dze wɔnkyer nsera wɔ dase ntamadan no ho nhyia
column3: amma ebufuw bi aammba Israelmba mboanofo no do: na Levifo no nhwɛ dase ntamadan ahwɛdze no do."

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛe; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara
